channel.title: CVE Feed for crmperks -- CRM Perks Forms – WordPress Form Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for crmperks -- CRM Perks Forms – WordPress Form Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-7484|2024-08-06T13:47:26.963Z -- crmperks -- crm%20perks%20forms%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20form%20builder
item.description: The CRM Perks Forms plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to insufficient file validation on the 'handle_uploaded_files' function in versions up to, and including, 1.1.3. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with administrator-level capabilities or above, to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.

item.title: CVE-2024-7484|2024-08-06T01:49:56.901Z -- crmperks -- crm%20perks%20forms%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20form%20builder
item.description: The CRM Perks Forms plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to insufficient file validation on the 'handle_uploaded_files' function in versions up to, and including, 1.1.3. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with administrator-level capabilities or above, to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.
